keyword: how many calories are in a twisted tea
title: How Many Calories Are in a Twisted Tea?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a twisted tea (12 oz Original), plus carbs, sugars, sodium, and variations for different flavors.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Twisted Tea?
assumptions: Original flavor, 12 fl oz bottle/can, 5% ABV, no added mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, serving size, and brand specifics. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Twisted Tea Original contains about 144 calories and 12.5 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to Twisted Tea Light (per bottle)
Use Twisted Tea Half & Half lemonade flavor (per bottle)
Mix with diet soda (no added calories)

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Twisted Tea Original?
faqs.a: About 144 calories in one 12 fl oz bottle.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Twisted Tea?
faqs.a: 12.5 g carbs, all from sugars, per 12 oz serving.

faqs.q: Does Twisted Tea have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 0 g protein and 0 g fat per bottle.

faqs.q: How does Twisted Tea Light compare?
faqs.a: Twisted Tea Light has only 75 calories per 12 oz, with fewer carbs.

faqs.q: Are there calories from alcohol in Twisted Tea?
faqs.a: Yes, the 5% ABV contributes to the total 144 calories, mostly from carbs and alcohol.
